dynamicSql.str: select u.frozdt as bgindt, u.froztp, u.frlmtp , u.frozsq, u.frozst, u.frozno as specno, u.frogna as deogna , b.cardno , c.custna , u.freddt as specdt, a.frozbl as tranam from knb_froz u, knb_froz_detl a , kna_acdc b, kna_cust c

if.str: a.frowid = u.CUSTAC and a.FROZNO = u.FROZNO and a.FROZSQ=u.FROZSQ and c.custac = u.custac and b.custac = u.custac

if.str: a.frowid = u.CUSTAC and a.FROZNO = u.FROZNO and a.FROZSQ=u.FROZSQ and c.custac = u.custac and b.custac = u.custac

dynamicSelect.longname: 查询特殊业务信息(扣划)

dynamicSql.str: select u.deduno as specno, b.cardno, u.dedutp, u.custna, u.crcycd, u.csextg, u.deduam as tranam, '07' as otsptp, u.trantp, u.frozno, u.frozdt, u.ufctno, u.dectno, u.deogtp, u.deogna, u.optp01, u.opno01, u.opna01, u.optp02, u.opno02, u.opna02, u.monyto, u.otheac, u.othena, u.othebk, u.reason, u.remark, u.trandt as bgindt from knb_dedu u left join kna_acdc b on (b.custac = u.custac)

select u.deduno as specno, b.cardno, u.dedutp, u.custna, u.crcycd, u.csextg, u.deduam as tranam, '07' as otsptp, u.trantp, u.frozno, u.frozdt, u.ufctno, u.dectno, u.deogtp, u.deogna, u.optp01, u.opno01, u.opna01, u.optp02, u.opno02, u.opna02, u.monyto, u.otheac, u.othena, u.othebk, u.reason, u.remark, u.trandt as bgindt from knb_dedu u left join kna_acdc b on (b.custac = u.custac)
order by u.deduno asc

dynamicSelect.longname: 查询特殊业务信息(存款证明)

dynamicSql.str: select t.trandt as bgindt, u.froztp, u.frlmtp , u.frozsq, u.frozst, t.deprnm as specno,u.frogna as deogna , b.cardno , t.custna , d.unfrdt as specdt, t.depram as tranam,null as otsptp,t.deprtp,t.deprbp from knb_depr t left join knb_froz u on (t.custac = u.custac and t.MNTRSQ = u.MNTRSQ) left join knb_depr_owne d on(t.DEPRSQ = d.DEPRSQ and t.DEPRNM = d.DEPRNM) left join kna_acdc b on (t.custac = b.custac)

select.sql: select a.FROZNO,a.FROZDT,a.FROZTM,a.CRCYCD,a.FREXOG,a.FROGNA,a.REMARK,a.FRLMTP,c.FROZBL from knb_froz a inner join (select frozno,min(frozsq) frozsq from knb_froz where frozst = '0' and (froztp = '1' or froztp = '2') group by frozno) b on (a.frozno = b.frozno and a.frozsq = b.frozsq) inner join knb_froz_detl c on (a.frozno = c.frozno and a.frozsq = c.frozsq) and a.custac = #custac#

select.sql: select a.frogna, c.frozbl,a.frctno,a.freddt ,a.frlmtp from knb_froz a join (select frozno ,min(frozsq) as frozsq from knb_froz where frozst = '0' and (froztp = '1' or froztp = '2') group by frozno) b on (a.frozno = b.frozno and a.frozsq = b.frozsq) join knb_froz_detl c on (a.frozno = c.frozno and a.frozsq = c.frozsq) where a.custac = #custac# order by frozdt asc ,froztm asc

select.longname: 根据账户别名查询子账户列表
select.sql: select p.acctno,f.custna as acctna,f.tmcustna as tmacctna,p.custac,q.acctst,a.tlphno as acalno,a.tmtlphno ,c.cardno from kna_accs p left join kna_acct q on p.acctno=q.acctno left join kna_acal a on a.custac=p.custac left join kna_cust f on f.custac = p.custac left join kna_acdc c on c.custac = p.custac where 1=1 and p.custac in (select custac from kna_acal b where b.tlphno=#acalno# ) and p.corpno = #corpno#

select.longname: 查找主账户号
select.sql: SELECT t.corpno,t.custac,t.acaltp,t.tlphno as acalno,t.acalst,t.tmstmp FROM kna_acal t where t.tlphno= #acalno#

select.longname: 查询子账户信息
select.sql: select * from KNA_ACCT where acctno=#acctno#

select.longname: 查询子账户信息
select.sql: select * from KNA_ACCT where acctno=#acctno#

dynamicSelect.longname: 冻结止付登记簿查询

dynamicSql.str: select case when t.stactp = '0' then a.custna when t.stactp = '1' then (SELECT custna FROM kna_cust h WHERE h.CUSTAC in (SELECT f.custac FROM kna_acct f WHERE f.ACCTNO=t.custac )) END custna, b.acctna acctna, case when t.stactp = '0' then c.tlphno when t.stactp = '1' then d.tlphno end acalno, case when t.stactp = '0' then c.tmtlphno when t.stactp = '1' then d.tmtlphno end tmtlphno, case when t.stactp = '0' then e.cardno when t.stactp = '1' then f.cardno end cardno, t.*, nvl((select sum(g.frozam) from knb_froz_detl g where g.frozno = t.frozno and g.frozst = '0'), 0) as frozam from ( select a.*, row_number() over (partition by a.frozno order by a.froztp desc) as group_idx from knb_froz a ) t left join kna_cust a on a.custac = t.custac left join kna_acct b on b.acctno = t.custac left join kna_acal c on c.custac = t.custac left join kna_acal d on d.custac in (select custac from kna_accs t1 where t.custac = t1.acctno) left join kna_acdc e on e.custac = t.custac left join kna_acdc f on f.custac in (select t1.custac from kna_accs t1 where t1.acctno = t.custac)

if.str: t.custac in ( select acctno from kna_accs where custac in (select custac from kna_acal where tlphno =#acalno#)) or t.custac in (select custac from kna_acal where tlphno = #acalno#)

dynamicSql.str: order by t.frozdt desc

select.longname: 查询最大的冻结序号
select.sql: select max(frozsq) from knb_froz where frozno=#frozno# and frozst=#frozst#

dynamicSelect.longname: 查询不同冻结状态的记录

dynamicSql.str: select * from knb_froz a

select.longname: 根据卡号查主账户号
select.sql: select * from kna_acdc f where f.cardno= #cardno#
